channel.title: I need help... with my .cilent
channel.description:
ok howdo i edit my cilent when i try, it says alot of stuff about java and dosent work, but the ariganal file that came with source dose work. how do i fix this?
and is there any good places to learnhow to ccode

item.title: I need help... with my .cilent
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

Steady hands you got there.

But err…doe’s it say something like.

“The path cannot be specified”

if so just right click your compiler and hit edit, then delete whatever you have in there and depending on your JDK copy this into there.

JDK 6 update 6

@echo off Title Master Monk's Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_6\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

JDK 6 Update 7

@echo off Title Master Monk's Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_7\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

JDK 6 Update 8 (If this even Exists.)

@echo off Title Master Monk's Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_8\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

JDK 6 Upate 9 (If this even Exists.)

@echo off Title Master Monk's Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

JDK 6 Update 10

@echo off Title Master Monk's Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

JDK 6 Update 11 (Current Verison…)

@echo off Title Master Monk's Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
